isis.stitle: TSI 01-12-13 - Improved Shim and Service Kit for Camshaft Position (CMP) Sensor

subjectgroup.subject: Improved Shim and Service Kit for Camshaft Position (CMP) Sensor

geninfo.para: A new shim and service kit for the camshaft position (CMP) sensor have been released. The new service kit (P/N 1841521C91), consisting of two 0.25 mm (0.010 in) thick shims and two 0.13 mm (0.005 in) thick shims, replaces the existing kit (P/N 1826583C91) that is used in the field.

The new shim has a larger inside diameter [25 mm (1 in)] than the old shim. This allows for installation of the shim without removing the sensor O-ring, thus making assembly easier. The outside diameter was also changed to 38 mm (1.5 in). Both dimensions are a standard shim size.
The new shim material is brass instead of steel. Changing to a non-ferrous metal prevents interference with the sensor's internal magnet, also making assembly easier.
